CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1953, p. 11, reads: "Calvary's Christmas Party - Children at this Christmas party given by Calvary Baptist Church, 2424 Wylie Avenue, had a big time.  Besides a variety of fruits and candies, there were games and program exercises which delighted even the adults present.  Calvary's membership is growing by leaps and bounds. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man holding architectural toy with boy, and other children, including girl on left standing behind "Junior Spike Jones" drum, posed in front of Christmas tree, in Calvary Baptist Church
